simulator

Interface Kernel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    InterruptHandler, SystemCall
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KernelFCFS, KernelRR

    public interface Kernel
extends SystemCall, InterruptHandler
    Interface to the simulated kernel. Provides two sub interfaces: a system call interface, and an interrupt handler. See the documentation for those interfaces for details.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface simulator.SystemCall

        EXECVE, IO_REQUEST, MAKE_DEVICE, TERMINATE_PROCESS

      • Fields inherited from interface simulator.InterruptHandler

        TIME_OUT, WAKE_UP

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface simulator.SystemCall

        syscall

      • Methods inherited from interface simulator.InterruptHandler

        interrupt
